name: PATHFINDER (Studio Void)
description:
THIS GAME IS UNFINISHED. Please be mindful of this when playing.

A PSX style 3D metroidvania made for the Metroidvania Month XIV Jam.

Controls

Move - WASD

Jump - Space, hold to hover

Select Weapon - 1: Pistol, 2: Grenades, 3:Flamethrower

Crouch - Ctrl
